# RDP-UDP (MS-RDPEUDP) Protocol

## Port: **3389**

## Proto: **UDP**

## Data Amplification factor: **~28.6 --> 86x**

## Packet Amplification factor: **3x***

## Reflector count: **13,700 (Aug 2020)**

---

- Microsoft RDP: UDP Transport Extension Protocol is vulnerable to CWE-406.

- Introduced with RDP Version 8 alongside Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 R2, RDPEUDP is an extension to allow UDP transport for RDP.

- The default connection mode is "Reliable" mode which transmits packets 3 times in testing upon no "syn-ack" datagram (reply). The RDP-UDP Protocol overview states the 2 types of "UDP Connection Initialization" modes here: <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-rdpeudp/aea14a52-baa1-4486-bcd8-f30505ec707d>.

- The response *session id* or initialization connection unique identifier was found to be present on the `4 bytes` located at index `8:11`.

- The constant amplification factor of the initial packet is 28.6x. Due to retransmission, with a single request packet, the total **data amplification is 84x** with a **packet amplification of 3x**. The request packet was discovered and simplified to nullbytes via fuzzing against a Windows Server lab target.

- Keep in mind that the RDP service will retransmit on a 3000 ms timer after the first request and will not *flood* the target regardless of further incoming request packets until all re-transmissions are complete. This lessens the threat of this service in use as a DrDoS source however in significant reflector numbers it can still cause problems.

### Example Requests / Responses

- Request: **16 data bytes**

  - ASCII: `nothing human readable`

  - `> ~# echo -ne '\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\xff\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00'|nc -u 89.191.230.6 3389 -w2|xxd -p`

- Response: **First packet 1232 bytes**, **Transmitted 3 times**

  - ASCII character space: `\00\00\00\00\00@\00\05\fbm\06\e8\04\d0\04\d0\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\00\0   - Raw bytes (example only because of Session token randomness): ``

### Documentation

- [MS-RDPEUDP: Remote Desktop Protocol: UDP Transport Extension (Microsoft Docs)](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-rdpeudp/2744a3ee-04fb-407b-a9e3-b3b2ded422b1)
  - Protocol and modes <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-rdpeudp/aea14a52-baa1-4486-bcd8-f30505ec707d>
  - 1.3.2.1 Initialization of UDP session <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-rdpeudp/8275cf8a-6b98-497f-b8b7-a8d015888b89>
  - SYN/ACK Datagram model for use in RDPEUDP <https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-rdpeudp/96eaa81a-ff42-40a2-884c-96b3834db6c8>

### Mitigations

- Fallback to standard TCP and prevent UDP if RDPEUDP is not required on the network.
- Switch from default "Reliable" (RDP-UDP-R) mode to "Best-Effort" (RDP-UDP-L) to prevent packet retransmission.
- Flowspec for IP's (spoofed targets) transmitting these "Connection Initialization" packets too rapidly.
- ACL block `srcport 3389` with `len 1232` and byte index `12:-1` consisting only of `\x00` null bytes.
